scripts.watch: tsc -b -w # WARNING - this might produce unexpected results - see https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/issues/33770
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --names "0: typescript,1: server,2: client" "yarn watch" "yarn dev:server" "yarn dev:client"
scripts.build:old: yarn purge:build && yarn --cwd common build && yarn --cwd scraper build && yarn --cwd server build && yarn --cwd client build
scripts.build: yarn run build:ts && yarn --cwd client build && cd server && node dist/predeploy.js && cd ..
scripts.docker:build: docker build -t kipras/turbo-schedule:$TAG . && docker tag kipras/turbo-schedule:$TAG kipras/turbo-schedule:latest
scripts.docker:push: docker push kipras/turbo-schedule:$TAG && docker push kipras/turbo-schedule:latest
scripts.docker:deploy: yarn docker:build && yarn docker:login && yarn docker:push
